it.polimi.modaclouds.space4cloud.utils

Class ResourceContainerDerivation

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.modaclouds.space4cloud.utils.ResourceContainerDerivation

  • public class ResourceContainerDerivation
extends Object
    Provides the methods needed to transform Cloud Resources and Cloud Platforms into a Palladio Resource Containers.
    Author:
    Davide Franceschelli
    See Also:
    CloudPlatform, CloudResource, ResourceContainer

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • completeResourceContainer

        public static ResourceContainer completeResourceContainer(ResourceContainer rc,
                                                          it.polimi.modaclouds.resourcemodel.cloud.CloudPlatform cp)
        Updates an existing Palladio Resource Container with the Processing Resources derived from the specified Cloud Platform. The derived Palladio Processing Resources will have default MTTF and MTTR attribute values.
        Parameters:
        rc - is the existing ResourceContainer.
        cp - is the CloudPlatform object.
        Returns:
        the updated ResourceContainer object.
        See Also:
        ResourceContainer, CloudPlatform

      • completeResourceContainer

        public static ResourceContainer completeResourceContainer(ResourceContainer rc,
                                                          it.polimi.modaclouds.resourcemodel.cloud.CloudPlatform cp,
                                                          double MTTF,
                                                          double MTTR)
        Updates an existing Palladio Resource Container with the Processing Resources derived from the specified Cloud Platform. The derived Palladio Processing Resources will have the specified MTTF and MTTR attribute values.
        Parameters:
        rc - is the existing ResourceContainer.
        cp - is the CloudPlatform object.
        MTTF - is the Mean Time To Failure to assign to the Processing Resources within the container.
        MTTR - is the Mean Time To Repair to assign to the Processing Resources within the container.
        Returns:
        a new ResourceContainer object.
        See Also:
        CloudPlatform, ResourceContainer

      • completeResourceContainer

        public static ResourceContainer completeResourceContainer(ResourceContainer rc,
                                                          it.polimi.modaclouds.resourcemodel.cloud.CloudResource cr)
        Updates an existing Palladio Resource Container with the Processing Resources derived from the specified Cloud Resource. The derived Palladio Processing Resources will have default MTTF and MTTR attribute values.
        Parameters:
        rc - is the existing ResourceContainer.
        cr - is the CloudResource object.
        Returns:
        the updated ResourceContainer object.
        See Also:
        ResourceContainer, CloudResource

      • completeResourceContainer

        public static ResourceContainer completeResourceContainer(ResourceContainer rc,
                                                          it.polimi.modaclouds.resourcemodel.cloud.CloudResource cr,
                                                          double MTTF,
                                                          double MTTR)
        Updates an existing Palladio Resource Container with the Processing Resources derived from the specified Cloud Resource. The derived Palladio Processing Resources will have the specified MTTF and MTTR attribute values.
        Parameters:
        rc - is the existing ResourceContainer.
        cr - is the CloudResource object.
        MTTF - is the Mean Time To Failure to assign to the Processing Resources within the container.
        MTTR - is the Mean Time To Repair to assign to the Processing Resources within the container.
        Returns:
        a new ResourceContainer object.
        See Also:
        CloudResource, ResourceContainer

      • deriveResourceContainer

        public static ResourceContainer deriveResourceContainer(String name,
                                                        it.polimi.modaclouds.resourcemodel.cloud.CloudPlatform cp)
        Derives a NEW Palladio Resource Container from the specified Cloud Platform, with the specified name. Palladio Processing Resources within the created Resource Container will have default MTTF and MTTR attribute values.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the container.
        cp - is the CloudPlatform object.
        Returns:
        a new ResourceContainer object.
        See Also:
        CloudPlatform, ResourceContainer

      • deriveResourceContainer

        public static ResourceContainer deriveResourceContainer(String name,
                                                        it.polimi.modaclouds.resourcemodel.cloud.CloudPlatform cp,
                                                        double MTTF,
                                                        double MTTR)
        Derives a NEW Palladio Resource Container from the specified Cloud Platform, with the specified name. Palladio Processing Resources within the created Resource Container will have the specified MTTF and MTTR attribute values.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the container.
        cp - is the CloudPlatform object.
        MTTF - is the Mean Time To Failure to assign to the Processing Resources within the container.
        MTTR - is the Mean Time To Repair to assign to the Processing Resources within the container.
        Returns:
        a new ResourceContainer object.
        See Also:
        CloudPlatform, ResourceContainer

      • deriveResourceContainer

        public static ResourceContainer deriveResourceContainer(String name,
                                                        it.polimi.modaclouds.resourcemodel.cloud.CloudResource cr)
        Derives a NEW Palladio Resource Container from the specified Cloud Resource, with the specified name. Palladio Processing Resources within the created Resource Container will have default MTTF and MTTR attribute values.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the container.
        cr - is the CloudResource object.
        Returns:
        a new ResourceContainer object.
        See Also:
        CloudResource, ResourceContainer

      • deriveResourceContainer

        public static ResourceContainer deriveResourceContainer(String name,
                                                        it.polimi.modaclouds.resourcemodel.cloud.CloudResource cr,
                                                        double MTTF,
                                                        double MTTR)
        Derives a NEW Palladio Resource Container from the specified Cloud Resource, with the specified name. Palladio Processing Resources within the created Resource Container will have the specified MTTF and MTTR attribute values.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the container.
        cr - is the CloudResource object.
        MTTF - is the Mean Time To Failure to assign to the Processing Resources within the container.
        MTTR - is the Mean Time To Repair to assign to the Processing Resources within the container.
        Returns:
        a new ResourceContainer object.
        See Also:
        CloudResource, ResourceContainer
